section.title: qsc_rcs_keyparams Struct Reference

para.para: The key parameters structure containing key, nonce, and info arrays and lengths. Use this structure to load an input cipher-key and optional info tweak, using the qsc_rcs_initialize function. Keys must be random and secret, and align to the corresponding key size of the cipher implemented. The info parameter is optional, and can be a salt or cryptographic key. The nonce is always QSC_RCS_BLOCK_SIZE in length.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: The key parameters structure containing key, nonce, and info arrays and lengths. Use this structure to load an input cipher-key and optional info tweak, using the qsc_rcs_initialize function. Keys must be random and secret, and align to the corresponding key size of the cipher implemented. The info parameter is optional, and can be a salt or cryptographic key. The nonce is always QSC_RCS_BLOCK_SIZE in length.
